issue.title: [Java] Remove duplicated logic in MapVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5897](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5897). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current implementation of MapVector contains much logic duplicate from the super class. We remove the duplication by:
1. Making the default data vector name configurable
1. Extract a method for creating the reader

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5897?focusedCommentId=16882396) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4842
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4842>
